TextLibrary.Text: You must travel to Barthel and collect the Emperor's daughter, Princess Serephine.
You must decide whether to give Serephine to Utrarg of Trarg, or whether to free her in Bartonia.
Utrarg of Trarg is pleased with his new bride. He gives you a small payment of gold as a token of his gratitude.
Serephine has been freed and she gives you the reward as promised. She also joins you as a Companion.
